column3: Latest; Phnom Penh: According to preliminary reports
column4: a Chinese man fell from the Gateway building
column5: causing his death at 11:00 am on August 27
column7: the man was identified as PENG LIANGXIANG and his victim.------The building under construction is about 30 stories high and located in Phsar Depot 3
column9: Phnom Penh.------ According to security sources
column10: the victim had fallen down an elevator shaft on the site from the 12th floor.------However
column11: it is not known whether he had committed suicide
column12: had an accident or something else. Journalists were not allowed access to the site. ------KOHSANTEPHEAP
